## SIZEOF variable

Size information (in bytes) for [Type](./api.type.md) enums. For [GLType](./api.gltype.md)<!-- -->, use this form, e.g. `SIZEOF[GL2TYPE[GLType.F32]]`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SIZEOF: {
    0: number;
    1: number;
    2: number;
    3: number;
    4: number;
    5: number;
    6: number;
    7: number;
    8: number;
}
```
